snippet: The group Art + Feminism is organizing its second edit-a-thon to address gender imbalance on Saturday, with tutorials at the Museum of Modern Art and satellite sessions around the world.
abstract: The group Art + Feminism is organizing its second edit-a-thon to address gender imbalance on Saturday, with tutorials at the Museum of Modern Art and satellite sessions around the world.

headline.main: MoMA to Host Wikipedia Editing Marathon, to Improve Coverage of Women in the Arts
